casebody.data:
Charles LAFORGE,1 Respondent Below, Appellant,
v.
DIVISION OF FAMILY SERVICES, Petitioner Below, Appellee. No. 335, 2017 Supreme Court of Delaware. Submitted: May 2, 2018
Decided: May 8, 2018

--------

AFFIRMED.

In accordance with Del. Sup. Ct. R. 7(d), the Court has assigned a pseudonym to the Appellant.

1
